Author: LavenirICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Lavenir - Cryptocurrency Lending Platform Devoted to Sustainability
Body: Hello, and thank you for your response. Some of the key differences between us and other competitors include but are not limited to:  the acceptance of a wider variety of cryptocurrencies for investment (since many main competitors only accept bitcoin or ethereum)  the use of real professionals to handle investor funds and maximize profits (instead of trading bots used by most other platforms)  simple and easy to understand interest rates- investors can lock in their interest rate at the time of making the loan instead of having their payments calculated by complex and hard to understand formulas  the ability to lend with no minimum loan period, since most other platforms typically require a minimum loan duration of an extended period of time  the platform's cryptocurrency is NOT required to make a loan, people lend their actual cryptocurrencies and earn interest on their actual coins. The Lavenir token is simply held to receive dividends from the platform's profits and for voting rights  an overall business model devoted to long-term success of the platform, with interest rates that provide a perfect balance between providing investors a sizable profit and allowing the site to still profit to generate dividends for token holders

Author: LavenirICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Lavenir - Cryptocurrency Lending Platform Devoted to Sustainability
Body: There are certainly other lending platforms in existence already which provide investment products to users. However, our goal in time is to provide a level of service that is unmatched by other competitors. And the business model of our platform is certainly designed more for longevity that as a get rick quick scheme like most other cryptocurrency investing services promote. Our platform is also largely user driven and we have a voting system where users can vote on site proposals and even submit their own proposals. So the direction our company takes depends largely on what the users want to ensure we can provide the best experience possible. We will note than in the early stages, we will require users to have a minimum of 50,000 LVR tokens in order to submit their own proposals to encourage high quality proposals and reduce spam. But this requirement will be reduced and likely eliminated over time.

Author: LavenirICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Lavenir - Cryptocurrency Lending Platform Devoted to Sustainability
Body: Lavenir is a lending platform built on Ethereum where people can loan their cryptocurrency and earn steady, consistent interest payments on their investments. Interest payments come from a share of the profits made through trading the cryptocurrency invested on the platform. The main types of trading to be performed are arbitrage trading and analyzing chart patterns to accurately predict the rises and falls in cryptocurrency prices, although several other trading methods will be used.  The major difference between Lavenir and other cryptocurrency lending platforms lies in its long-term sustainability. No unreasonably high interest rates are offered that would compromise the ability to pay investors unlike many other platforms. Our team consists of highly skilled professionals with years of experience trading cryptocurrency, stocks, bonds, futures, and other securities. This team will ensure maximum profitability on all cryptocurrency trades done with investor funds. A wide range of loan durations are offered to match the needs of investors, including an option with no minimum loan period (can be cashed out at any time).  Unlike many competitors who only accept bitcoin, Lavenir accepts a wide variety of cryptocurrencies allowing users to earn interest on a wider variety of their holdings despite the platform being Ethereum based. The Lavenir token represents an ownership of the platform and entitles the user to a portion of the profits generated by the site as well as voting rights on site proposals. Purchasing the token is not required to make an investment. Investments are only made in the user's actual cryptocurrency. Lavenir is the platform set to digitize cryptocurrency investing with a simple, straightforward, and low-risk approach to investing that is unmatched by any other competitors.  Price: 1 ETH = 1000 LVR  Bonuses: 30% for investments made within the first 72 hours 20% for investments made within the first 7 days 10% for investments made within the first 14 days   The ICO will begin April 4 at 12:00 PM UTC.   For more details: visit the site: http://www.lavenir.io
